results.title: Pros and Cons of TypeScript: When and Why It's Better than - AltexSoft
results.snippet: TypeScript supports concepts from class-based object-oriented programming (OOP) like classes, interfaces, inheritance, and more. The OOP paradigm facilitates building a well-organized scalable code, and this advantage becomes more obvious as your project grows in size and complexity.
